title: Bloomberg Markets: Freund Says U.S. Needs China Trade Deals
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Freund Says U.S. Needs China Trade Deals
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Caroline Freund Senior Fellow:International Trade Peterson Institute for International Economics Discussing U.S.-China trade relations following President Trump signing a memorandum on addressing China’s laws, policies, practices, and actions related to intellectual property, innovation, and technology.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
